job_title: Community Support Associate in Eastern, KY
cons:
Poor management. Manager would play favorites with employees. Low pay and a lot of hours off the clock. Extremely stressful work environment and a lot of back stabbing among staff. Almost impossible to take time off. Meetings off the clock with no pay or comp time.
The rules and system were constantly changing with little to no training.

pros: Folks were paid on time. Decent benefits. The company was run by women.
cons: They expected you to work and get your paperwork finished during your shift. I couldn't do this so I stayed late. Honestly I didn't mind.

pros: Very flexible if you need time off
